message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.IR, cs.CYBER, cs.CR 

This paper proposes a method and a tool for measuring the influence of customers in online merchandise sites and evaluating the loyalty of customers of a brand based on their ratings and sentiments of their reviews. The paper also compares the proposed method with a baseline approach based on the concept of Net Promoter Score. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.SOC (Social and Behavioral Sciences). Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (cs.IR) and cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) aspects as it deals with online shopping and review data. Finally, the paper also discusses the financial health of a brand, which could fall under the category of computer security and cryptography (cs.CR).
